articles.author: Marlene Busko
articles.title: New ESC Guidelines for Infective Endocarditis - Medscape
articles.description: Endocarditis can present with many different clinical scenarios, so making the diagnosis can be challenging, says a co-chair of newly issued European guidelines for managing this disease.
articles.content: The European Society of Cardiology (ESC) has issued new guidelines for the prevention, diagnosis, and management of infective endocarditis (IE) a rare and potentially lethal inf2ection of the heart's… [+10130 chars]

articles.author: James Felton
articles.title: Ancient Ape Fossil Suggests Our Ancestors Were In Europe Before Africa - IFLScience
articles.description: "This new evidence supports the hypothesis that hominines originated in Europe and dispersed into Africa."
articles.content: A newly-identified ape, named Anadoluvius turkae, may challenge our origin story once more, according to a new study. The fossilized ape, found in an 8.7-million-year-old site in Türkiye, suggests th… [+2879 chars]
